archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Business Continuity Plan Development Process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
This process is used to create a individual business continuity plan for each business environments accross all parts of the organization to form a part of a wider business continuity programme.
Process is also covering the overall plan to encompass multiple business environments.
High level steps in here are for example:
- Assessing potential business impacts by utilizing Tietoevry Tech Services Risk regster (Archer) to perform a business impact assessment (BIA) - Threaths and Risks must be evaluated, control objectives considered and finally a sign-off for the risk treatments from business owners - Business continuity plan RACI Matrix needs to be created - Distribution of Business continuity plan must be considered - Process should ensure that individuals are informed of their responsibilities and relevant training/tooling should be provided - Process to review Business Continuity plan regularly - Plan sign-off - Process addresses also change management of business continuity - Process is used also to update the business continuity plans on regular basis
